name: ai-interviewer-backend
description: Backend server for AI Technical Interviewer

scripts.env:check: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); console.log('Environment variables loaded:'); console.log('PORT:', process.env.PORT); console.log('FRONTEND_URL:', process.env.FRONTEND_URL); console.log('PRODUCTION_FRONTEND_URL:', process.env.PRODUCTION_FRONTEND_URL); console.log('MONGO_DB_NAME:', process.env.MONGO_DB_NAME);"
scripts.dev:full: concurrently "npm run dev" "cd ../frontend && npm run dev"
